sneckomod:CheapStock.NAME: Cheap Stock
sneckomod:CheapStock.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, reduce the cost of the highest cost sneckomod:Offclass card in your hand by 1.
sneckomod:CheapStock.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL At the start of your turn, reduce the cost of the highest cost sneckomod:Offclass card in your hand by 1.

sneckomod:Cheat.NAME: Pure Luck
sneckomod:Cheat.DESCRIPTION: sneckomod:Snekproof. NL Gain sneckomod:Lucky until the end of turn. NL Exhaust.
sneckomod:Cheat.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: sneckomod:Snekproof. NL Gain sneckomod:Lucky until the end of turn.

sneckomod:DangerNoodle.NAME: Danger Noodle
sneckomod:DangerNoodle.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Repeat this for each sneckomod:Offclass card in your hand, then Exhaust those cards.

sneckomod:DefensiveFlair.NAME: Defensive Flair
sneckomod:DefensiveFlair.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block, increased by !M! for each sneckomod:Offclass card in your hand.

sneckomod:DiceBoulder.NAME: Dice Boulder
sneckomod:DiceBoulder.DESCRIPTION: Deal !M! - !D! damage. NL Can be Upgraded any number of times.

sneckomod:DiceCrush.NAME: Dice Crush
sneckomod:DiceCrush.DESCRIPTION: Deal !M! - !D! damage. NL Put a card from your hand on top of you draw pile.

sneckomod:GlitteringGambit.NAME: Serpent's Hoard
sneckomod:GlitteringGambit.DESCRIPTION: Choose: Obtain a random potion, or gain !M! *Gold. NL Exhaust.
sneckomod:GlitteringGambit.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: sneckomod:Snekproof. NL Choose: Obtain a random potion, or gain !M! *Gold. NL Exhaust.

sneckomod:ImprovisedAttack.NAME: Improvised Attack
sneckomod:ImprovisedAttack.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain a random sneckomod:Offclass Attack and sneckomod:Muddle it.

sneckomod:ImprovisedGuard.NAME: Improvised Guard
sneckomod:ImprovisedGuard.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Gain a random sneckomod:Offclass Skill and sneckomod:Muddle it.

sneckomod:MasterEye.NAME: Master Eye
sneckomod:MasterEye.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, draw a card, then sneckomod:Muddle it.
sneckomod:MasterEye.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL At the start of your turn, draw a card and sneckomod:Muddle it.

sneckomod:Memorize.NAME: Memorize
sneckomod:Memorize.DESCRIPTION: sneckomod:Snekproof. NL Choose a card which started *Unidentified. sneckomod:Identify it. NL Fleeting.
sneckomod:Memorize.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: sneckomod:Snekproof. Retain. NL Choose a card which started *Unidentified. sneckomod:Identify it. NL Fleeting.

sneckomod:MixItUp.NAME: Mix It Up!
sneckomod:MixItUp.DESCRIPTION: *Transform your Potions. NL Deal !D! damage !M! times. NL Exhaust.

sneckomod:MorePower.NAME: More Power!
sneckomod:MorePower.DESCRIPTION: Obtain an additional Upgraded sneckomod:Offclass card reward at the end of combat.

sneckomod:Mudshield.NAME: Mud Shield
sneckomod:Mudshield.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you *Muddle a card, gain !M! Block.
sneckomod:Mudshield.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Whenever you *Muddle a card, gain !M! Block.

sneckomod:Nope.NAME: Nope
sneckomod:Nope.DESCRIPTION: sneckomod:Snekproof. NL Exhaust a card. Gain a random card of the same class.
sneckomod:Nope.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: sneckomod:Snekproof. NL Exhaust a card. Gain a random card of the same class. NL It costs 1 less.

sneckomod:PureSnecko.NAME: Shift
sneckomod:PureSnecko.DESCRIPTION: sneckomod:Snekproof. NL *Transform all sneckomod:Offclass cards in your hand.
sneckomod:PureSnecko.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: sneckomod:Snekproof. NL *Transform all sneckomod:Offclass cards in your hand. NL They cost 1 less.

sneckomod:QuickBite.NAME: Snake Rake
sneckomod:QuickBite.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Draw !M! cards, then discard any that are non sneckomod:Offclass.

sneckomod:QuickMove.NAME: Quick Move
sneckomod:QuickMove.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Draw !M! card, then sneckomod:Muddle it.
sneckomod:QuickMove.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL sneckomod:Muddle the !M! highest-cost cards in your hand.

sneckomod:RainOfDice.NAME: Rain of Dice
sneckomod:RainOfDice.DESCRIPTION: Deal !DM! - !D! damage to a random enemy. NL sneckomod:Muddle this, then return this to your hand.

sneckomod:Restock.NAME: Restock
sneckomod:Restock.DESCRIPTION: sneckomod:Snekproof. NL Draw until you have !M! cards in your hand. NL Exhaust.

sneckomod:Rotation.NAME: Rotation
sneckomod:Rotation.DESCRIPTION: sneckomod:Snekproof. NL Discard all sneckomod:Offclass cards. NL Draw that many cards.
sneckomod:Rotation.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: sneckomod:Snekproof. NL Discard all sneckomod:Offclass cards. NL Draw that many cards plus !M!.

sneckomod:SerpentIdol.NAME: Serpent Idol
sneckomod:SerpentIdol.DESCRIPTION: sneckomod:Snekproof. NL Choose 1 of 3 random sneckomod:Offclass cards to gain. It costs 0 this turn. NL Exhaust.

sneckomod:SerpentMind.NAME: Exotic Form
sneckomod:SerpentMind.DESCRIPTION: sneckomod:Snekproof. NL Whenever you play an sneckomod:Offclass card, draw 1 card.
sneckomod:SerpentMind.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play an sneckomod:Offclass card, draw 1 card.

sneckomod:SlitherStrike.NAME: Slither Strike
sneckomod:SlitherStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Reduce the cost of sneckomod:Offclass cards in your hand by 1 this turn.

sneckomod:SnakeSap.NAME: Snake Sap
sneckomod:SnakeSap.DESCRIPTION: sneckomod:Snekproof. NL Deal !DM! - !D! damage. NL Gain 1 - !M! [E] . NL Exhaust.

sneckomod:SnekBeam.NAME: Snek Beam
sneckomod:SnekBeam.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage to ALL enemies equal to the number of Unidentified cards in your deck. NL Exhaust.
sneckomod:SnekBeam.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal damage to ALL enemies equal to the number of Unidentified cards in your deck.

sneckomod:SnekBite.NAME: Snek Bite
sneckomod:SnekBite.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL sneckomod:Muddle the highest-cost card in your hand.
sneckomod:SnekBite.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL sneckomod:Muddle the !M! highest-cost cards in your hand.

sneckomod:SoulCleanse.NAME: Soul Cleanse
sneckomod:SoulCleanse.DESCRIPTION: sneckomod:Snekproof. NL sneckomod:Muddle your hand. Cards sneckomod:Muddled this way cannot cost 3. NL Exhaust.
sneckomod:SoulCleanse.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: sneckomod:Snekproof. NL sneckomod:Muddle your hand. Cards sneckomod:Muddled this way cannot cost 3.

sneckomod:SoulDraw.NAME: Soul Draw
sneckomod:SoulDraw.DESCRIPTION: sneckomod:Snekproof. NL Gain !M! random sneckomod:Offclass cards. NL Exhaust.

sneckomod:SoulExchange.NAME: Soul Exchange
sneckomod:SoulExchange.DESCRIPTION: sneckomod:Snekproof. NL Choose 2 cards. NL Swap their costs for the rest of combat.
sneckomod:SoulExchange.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: sneckomod:Snekproof. NL Draw !M! cards, NL Choose a card, then *Transform your hand to that card's class.

sneckomod:SoulRoll.NAME: Soul Roll
sneckomod:SoulRoll.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: sneckomod:Snekproof. NL sneckomod:Muddle !M! card. NL Cards *Muddled this way cannot cost 3.

sneckomod:TailWhip.NAME: Tail Whip
sneckomod:TailWhip.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! - 2 Weak. NL Apply !M! - 2 Vulnerable.

sneckomod:Transmogrify.NAME: Transmogrify
sneckomod:Transmogrify.DESCRIPTION: Choose 1 of 2 Relics to lose. NL Obtain a random Relic of the same rarity. NL Exhaust.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: I have no Relicsss to ssswap.

sneckomod:TrashToTreasure.NAME: Trash to Treasure
sneckomod:TrashToTreasure.DESCRIPTION: sneckomod:Snekproof. NL Exhaust a card. NL Gain [E] equal to its cost. NL Exhaust.
sneckomod:TrashToTreasure.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: sneckomod:Snekproof. NL Exhaust a card. NL Gain [E] equal to its cost.

sneckomod:UnendingSupply.NAME: Unending Supply
sneckomod:UnendingSupply.DESCRIPTION: At the start of each turn, gain a random sneckomod:Offclass card.

sneckomod:UnlimitedRolls.NAME: Unlimited Rolls
sneckomod:UnlimitedRolls.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, gain an gremlin:Echo of *Soul *Roll.
sneckomod:UnlimitedRolls.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL At the start of your turn, gain an gremlin:Echo of *Soul *Roll.

sneckomod:WideSting.NAME: Wide Sting
sneckomod:WideSting.DESCRIPTION: Deal !M! - !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Upgrade all sneckomod:Offclass cards in your hand.
